name: Ninja Bird (android)
description:
There is a bird who dreams to become a real Ninja. Then he come to the mountain of Ninja. It is said that once somebody could jump to the top of the mountain, then he/she can become a Super Ninja. GO, Bird. Get through all the difficulties and become a real Ninja.
(This game is still under development, which means there is going to be more chapters in the future)

You can also download game via Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DreamNight.NinjaJump

PS: Twitter---> https://twitter.com/CarotaaLi
